mapper.select: select main.id , main.targetId , main.editorContent , main.childId , main.ip , main.createTime , createUser.userId createUserId , createUser.realName createUserName , createUser.userSource createUserSource , createUser.portrait createUserPortrait from sys_comment main left join sys_user createUser on main.createUserId = createUser.userId where main.targetId = #{targetId} and main.childId is null order by main.id desc

SELECT main.id, main.targetId, article.title targetName, main.createUserId, main.ip, main.createTime, user.realName, user.userSource, main.dataStatus FROM sys_comment main LEFT JOIN blog_article article ON main.targetId = article.id LEFT JOIN sys_user user ON user.userId = main.createUserId WHERE main.moduleKey = 'Article'
and main.createTime >= concat(#{param.beginDate} , ' 00:00:00')
and main.createTime <= concat(#{param.endDate} , ' 23:59:59')
and article.title like concat('%' , #{param.title} , '%')
ORDER BY main.createTime desc
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_comment main SET main.dataStatus = #{dataStatus} WHERE main.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select main.* from sys_comment main where main.id = #{id}
select count(1) from sys_comment where targetId = #{targetId} and moduleKey = 'Article'

select usr.realName , usr.portrait , usr.userSource , main.createTime , main.editorContent content from sys_comment main left join sys_user usr on main.createUserId = usr.userId where main.moduleKey = 'Article' order by main.createTime desc limit #{limit}

select distinct a.createUserId , c.realName createUserName , c.userSource , a.createTime , b.id articleId , b.title from sys_comment a left join blog_article b on a.targetId = b.id left join sys_user c on c.userId = a.createUserId where a.moduleKey = 'Article' and a.createTime >= #{begin} and a.createTime <= #{end} order by b.title , a.createTime

select a.targetId, a.editorContent , a.replyUserId , b.realName , c.title , b.email , b.userSource from sys_comment a left join sys_user b on a.replyUserId = b.userId left join blog_article c on c.id = a.targetId where a.moduleKey = 'Article' and a.createTime >= #{begin} and a.createTime <= #{end} and b.email is not null and childId is not null and a.dataStatus = 'USABLE' order by a.createTime
